Include details, not shown above, re time. place, manner of last entry, and elements which establish administrative and/or criminal violation. Indicate means and route of travel to interior.) SUBJECT a citizen and national of India last entered the United States at NYC on 10/16/78 as a visitor for pleasure with a stay valid to 2/15/77. Letters written on behalf of SUBJECT indicate he is under treatment for cancer and are request√©ng an extension of stay so his treatment can be continued. SUBJECT was not interviewed personally.
